ValidationRule.description: SAB deals must have a Loan Effective Date and a 1st Payment Due Date before they can be Closed Won
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Record_Type_Name__c = "Single_Asset_Bridge_Loan", ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISPICKVAL(StageName , "Closed Won"), OR( ISNULL( First_Payment_Due_Date__c ) , ISNULL( Loan_Effective_Date__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Loan Effective Date and 1st Payment Due Date are required before closing a SAB deal.
